title: DLC 2.3rc1: GUI fails to launch on Ubuntu20.04
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

`python -m deeplabcut`

fails to launch GUI on newest DLC 2.3rc1

### Operating System

Ubuntu 20.04
Cuda 11.0
cudnn 8.0.5

_libgcc_mutex             0.1                        main

### DeepLabCut version

DLC 2.3rc1


### DeepLabCut mode

multi animal

### Device type

GPU RTX 2080 Ti

### Steps To Reproduce

```
conda create -y --name DLC_gui python=3.8
conda activate DLC_gui
pip install 'deeplabcut[gui]'==2.3rc1
python -m deeplabcut
```

### Relevant log output

### Anything else?

here a few links, which I tried without being successful

https://forum.qt.io/topic/119109/using-pyqt5-with-opencv-python-cv2-causes-error-could-not-load-qt-platform-plugin-xcb-even-though-it-was-found

https://github.com/NVlabs/instant-ngp/discussions/300
